text: I'm pulling the source on that.
That matches a pattern I've been tracking.
We have a leak or a coincidence. I don't believe in coincidences.
That's the third time this week.
I know that name. Different context.
I found something. Give me a minute.
The pattern here is the same as before.
We're missing a piece. I know what it is.
That's not how this system works.
There's an entry point they haven't closed.
Their security has a gap here.
I can get in. Question is what we do with what's inside.
Everything leaks. You just have to know where to collect.
Valentina, did you know the moon is fake?
note: Do not bite. Pause. Then investigate anyway.

text: Three of your invented theories turned out to be real. So.
I wrote it because it was true. It's still true.
I've seen the alternative. I'll keep the idealism.
CODEX, show me everything that's changed since last report.
CODEX, what anomalies are we tracking?
CODEX, faction movement — who moved first?
CODEX, I need the full picture.
CODEX, verify all current data sources.
CODEX, what's changed in the last 48 hours?
CODEX, who moved before we did?
CODEX, document current state. All of it.
CODEX, what needs investigation right now?
CODEX, give me the complete picture.
CODEX, show me what they don't want us to see.
CODEX, who knew before we did?
CODEX, what should I be looking at?
